Title: The Orville
Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Adrianne Palicki, Penny Johnson Jerald
Plot: Set 400 years in the future, finds the crew of the U.S.S. Orville continuing their mission of exploration, as they navigate both the mysteries of the universe and the complexities of their own interpersonal relationships.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. 3 wins & 13 nominations total
